In the given paragraph, "Stoke" and "Tranmere" can be identified as "Location" entities. However, it's important to note that these are not traditional location names but rather the names of football clubs. In this context, "Stoke" typically refers to Stoke-on-Trent, a city in England, which is the home of Stoke City F.C. Similarly, "Tranmere" usually refers to Tranmere Rovers F.C., a football club located in Birkenhead, Merseyside, England.
